summary: This document is a Certificate of Incumbency for Southern Financial, LLC, certifying Jeffrey Epstein as the manager of the company with full signing authority. It includes references to the Operating Agreement and the authority granted to Epstein in his role.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein certifies his position as the manager of Southern Financial, LLC, and confirms his signing authority.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn certifies Epstein's authority as manager of Southern Financial, LLC.

connections.description: Richard Kahn, as Treasurer of Southern Trust Company, Inc., certifies Epstein's authority as manager of Southern Financial, LLC.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the duly appointed manager of Southern Financial, LLC.
Epstein has full signing authority for the company.
The Operating Agreement of Southern Financial, LLC is dated February 16, 2013.
Richard Kahn certifies Epstein's authority as manager.
